homepage.presentation: I am a front-end developer interested in everything that orbits the scientific and IT world. I am working in retail projects of different brands, from luxury and fashion to beauty and cosmetics.
homepage.description: I maintain and implement front end web solutions and architectures, through the writing of optimal algorithms and clean code, to guarantee the website functionalities. I take care of the website performance and web accessibility. I had a strong interest on the Generative AI on which I keep myself updated to learn new technologies.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.name: Name
contact.sent: The message has been sent. Thank you!

about.title: About
about.paragraph: I am a Frontend Developer based in Milan, Italy. I have enjoyed turning complex problems into simple, through logic and reasoning. Since 2021 I discovered my passion for web development.
about.boldParagraph: Now I do the job I love.
about.studentParagraph: Studying is essential and an integral part of my work. I love studying and learning new things through which I look for new ideas and a continuous personal improvement.
about.coderParagraph: Coding is part of my daily life, through this I put into practice what I study. Programming is not just a job, it allows you to learn a way of thinking that makes everyday life easier.

footer.siteInfo: Coded in Visual Studio Code by yours truly. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, deployed with Vercel.

project.title: Projects I have worked on...
project.luxuryBrandDesc: I worked on a luxury e-commerce fashion website for two years allowed me to learn a lot in technical terms, using Salesforce Commerce Cloud as CRM system and React JS and TypeScript as technologies. The demand for continuous maintenance and new improvements enabled me to develop my skills in requirements analysis and understanding customer needs. I also developed logical thinking skills and learned how widely used technologies work. The required quality was very high, leading to meticulous attention to detail and continuous testing after development. Teamwork was also essential, with continuous updates and daily alignment on our activities. The willingness of each team member to learn and grow, as well as the great mutual respect we had for each other, definitely made us an excellent team.
project.cosmeticBrandDesc: I'm working on a famous cosmetic e-commerce. Here, I had the opportunity to learn new technologies such as Next.Js and a cleaner and more streamlined deployment system using Vercel. I am continuing to use React with Typescript, but I have discovered a more modern and innovative way of working.
project.a11yDesc: On some other projects, I am personally responsible for Web Accessibility. I perform audits in which I analyze all accessibility bugs and identify problems and possible solutions, in agreement with the development team and following the WCAG 2.2.
